items.detail: Are You Really Free? Or you just hop on a new cage?

items.title: Poetry / Lyrics
items.detail: Creative writing exploring themes of nature, technology, and human emotion.

about.name: Ivan Chan
about.a1: The idea that imagination can be made real through design and code.
about.q2: How do you see technology and art?
about.a2: As mirror and hammer — to reflect the world, and to shape it.

directors.title: Directors
directors.description: The auteurs who shaped my sense of framing and silence.

items.label: Jiang Wen
items.note: Master of satire and cultural layering. 'Devils on the Doorstep' was formative.

items.label: Quentin Tarantino
items.note: Dialogue as violence, rhythm as narrative.

items.label: Stanley Kubrick
items.note: Precision, geometry, and dread. Every frame a loaded chamber.

items.label: David Fincher
items.note: Cold, obsessive, surgical storytelling. A master of digital noir.

games.title: Games
games.description: Narratives and aesthetics that truly resonate.

items.label: Life Is Strange
items.note: Most emotionally resonant game. Choices, mood, music — everything just *clicks*.

items.label: P.T
items.note: The scariest hallway ever. Taught me how minimalism can be terrifying.

items.label: Metal Gear
items.note: Where story meets systems. Kojima is a storytelling anarchist.

items.label: Cyberpunk 2077
items.note: City as character. The melancholy of neon futures.

music.title: Music
music.description: What plays in my head when I design, code and dream.

items.label: JPEGMAFIA
items.note: Noisy, glitchy, brutally real. Punk through a sampler.

items.label: KAYTRANADA
items.note: Groove architect. Everything he touches bounces.

items.label: Flying Lotus
items.note: Jazz, death, space, and LA smashed into rhythm.

items.label: Flume
items.note: Glitch beauty. Chaos shaped into vibe.

items.label: Jack White
items.note: Garage mystic. Raw electricity in blues form.

items.label: Radiohead
items.note: Existential textures. If anxiety had harmony.
